member.param: The item that represents this entry
The display name of the entry.

member.name: ctor2
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the Entry class.
member.param: The item associated with the entry.

The xml comments file for the assembly.

member.name: findbykey1
member.summary: Iterates over the complete document map and attempts to find the item specified by the key.
member.param: The key to search the document map for
member.returns: The found keyvalue pair or null if not found.

member.name: findbykey2
member.summary: Iterates over the complete document map and attempts to find the item specified by the key.
member.param: The key to search the document map for
member.returns: The found keyvalue pair or null if not found.

member.name: search
member.summary: Search this entry and its children for the specified text. This will search the full name of all entries and its children.
member.returns: An array of entries that match the criteria.

member.name: findnamespace
member.summary: Finds the namespace in the document map based on the name provided.
member.returns: The found namespace entry or null if not found.

member.name: name
member.summary: The display name for this entry, this will be used foremost to display in the DocumentMap for the LiceDocument. This does not have to be unique.

member.name: parent
member.summary: The parent entry for this Entry.

member.name: class
member.summary: that produces document maps that start at the assembly level.
member.remarks:
An AssemblYFirstDocumentMapper produces a which starts at the assembly/library level e.g:
assembly.dll Namespace.First FirstType Fields .. SecondType Methods .. Namespace.Second anotherassembly.dll Namespace.Third FirstType Fields .. SecondType Methods .. Namespace.Fourth

member.name: ctor1
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the AssemblyFirstDocumentMapper.
member.param: The to use to initialise entries in the map.

member.name: class
member.summary: DocumentMapper that creats maps with the main focus being the namespace.

member.name: ctor1
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the NamespaceFirstDocumentMapper.
member.param: Indicates if an observable collection should be used instead of a normal one.
The factory class for creating new instances.
